## devtui xmlfmt

Format XML files

### Synopsis

Format XML files

```
devtui xmlfmt [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for xmlfmt
  -i, --indent string   Indent string for nested elements (default "  ")
  -n, --nested          Nested tags in comments
  -p, --prefix string   Each element begins on a new line and this prefix
```
